mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_consumer (id, consumer_name, phone, credits, sex, birthday, order_times, total_prices, open_id, email, address,login_times) VALUES (#{id},#{consumerName},#{phone},#{credits},#{sex},#{birthday}, #{orderTimes},#{totalPrices},#{openId},#{email},#{address},0);
mapper.update: update t_consumer set login_times = login_times+1 where id = #{id}
